item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – V NAV, FL CH, V/S, ALT HOLD Switches

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided procedures or en route operations do not require its use.

numlitem.para: For en route operations requiring altitude hold capability, remaining operational mode(s) may be used.
Manual Flight may also be used.

placard.para: Placard V NAV/FL CH/V/S ALT HOLD Switches "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
